title: Utilizing AI to Enhance Self-Regulated Learning
data:
S Aydan- Classroom Instruction Through AI-Powered Scaffolding, 2026
Self-regulated learning has emerged as a crucial factor in academic success, 
surpassing intelligence in its predictive value and equipping students to navigate 
through distractions. AI tools offer personalized feedback and dynamic support, 
enabling learners to regulate learning processes. However, research examining AI's 
role in SRL remains fragmented, highlighting the need for an exploratory literature 
review to map existing approaches, identify gaps, and uncover emerging patterns
